entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
